name: Masque of the Black Rose
description: Revelry and luxury reign at the Silken Danse, a masquerade uniting nobles and luminaries from across Runeterra. But in Noxus, the ballroom is a battlefield. A whisper is as sharp as a dagger, and power is traded between pleasantries. Even the reclusive Lady Elise has left her nest to host the event, in service to unseen eyesâ€¦ Watching. Waiting.
